jdbm.recman
Class FreePhysicalRowIdPage

java.lang.Object
  jdbm.recman.PageHeader
      jdbm.recman.FreePhysicalRowIdPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockView
final class FreePhysicalRowIdPage
extends PageHeader

Class describing a page that holds physical rowids that were freed.

Constant Field Values

ELEMS_PER_PAGE

final short ELEMS_PER_PAGE

wasteMargin

public static final transient int wasteMargin
Used to place a limit on the wasted capacity resulting in a modified first fit policy for re-allocated of free records. This value is the maximum first fit waste that is accepted when scanning the available slots on a given page of the free physical row page list.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

wasteMargin2

public static final transient int wasteMargin2
Used to place a limit on the wasted capacity resulting in a modified first fit policy for re-allocated of free records. This value is the upper bound of waste that is accepted before scanning another page on the free physical row page list. If no page can be found whose waste for the re-allocation request would be less than this value then a new page will be allocated and the requested physical row will be allocated from that new page.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
